chunks.cleaned_english_translation:
About a certain Freculfus who lost his mind.

During the reign of Asuero, a chief of the royal estate named Freculfus, from a place not far called Wasalia, lost his mind. When his people took him to the venerable memorial, he regained his sanity.
chunks.original_latin:
De quodam Freculfo mente capto. 9. Sub eodem Asuero quidam major regiae villae
 quae non longe posita Wasalia dicitur, Frecholfus,
nomine mente captus, cum esset a suis ad venerandam
memoriam deductus, mentis sanitatem recepit.
